1.label: Minimum brightness level
1.description: Set the desired value from 1 to 98% for the minimum dim level that the dimmer is restricted to, the dimmer will not go lower than the value set here.

2.label: Maximum brightness level
2.description: Set the desired value from 2 to 99% for the maximum dim level that the dimmer is restricted to; the dimmer will not go higher than the value set here.

3.label: Automatic control - dimming step size
3.description: This parameter defines the percentage value of dimming step during the automatic control.

4.label: Automatic control - time of a dimming step
4.description: This parameter defines the time of single dimming step set in parameter 3 during the automatic control.

5.label: Manual control - dimming step size
5.description: This parameter defines the percentage value of dimming step during the manual control.

6.label: Manual control - time of a dimming step
6.description: This parameter defines the time of single dimming step setin parameter 5 during the manual control.

7.label: Memory function after power failure
7.description: Set the desired value from 0 to 1 to turn on/off the memory function.Setting this value to 0 turns off the dimmer's Memory fucntion.Setting this value to 1 truns on the dimmer's Memory function.

options.label: Device does not save the state before a power failure, it returns to off position
Device restores it's state before power failure

8.label: Scene ID set
8.description: Scene ID is set by this configuration. Note: The actual action of each SCENE ID are set by SCENE_ACTUATOR_CONF(0x26) command.

9.label: Timer functionality (auto - off)
9.description: This parameter allows to automatically switch off the device after specified time from switching on the light source. It may be useful when the Zerodim Z-Wave is installed in the stairway. Available settings: 0 - Function disabled. 1-32767 - time to turn off measured in seconds (1s-9.1h)
